Add the emission reduction targets to the companies dataset

Source: R/istr_add_reductions.R
istr_add_reductions.Rd

Adds the emission reduction values for each company's product(s).

Usage

istr_add_reductions(companies, weo_2022)

Arguments

companies

A data.frame. The output of istr_mapping().

weo_2022

A data.frame like istr_weo_2022.

Value

A dataframe with:

  • All the columns from the companies dataset.

  • New columns:

    • All the columns from the ep_weo dataset, but the columns eco_sectors is named ECO_sector respectively.

    • All the columns from the weo_2022 dataset, but the columns weo_product_mapper and weo_flow_mapper are named product and flow, respectively.

See also

Other ISTR functions: istr_add_transition_risk(), istr_aggregate_scores(), istr_mapping(), istr()

Author

Lyanne Ho.

Examples

istr_companies |>
  istr_mapping(istr_ep_weo) |>
  istr_add_reductions(istr_weo_2022)
